articles.author: Dan Williams
articles.description: Israel ruled out on Sunday a diplomatic base in Jerusalem for the new Saudi envoy to the Palestinians, whose appointment comes as Washington tries to forge formal Israeli relations with Riyadh.
articles.title: Israel rules out Jerusalem base for Saudi envoy to Palestinians

articles.author: Gul Yousafzai
articles.description: Militants attacked a Pakistani military convoy near the strategic southwestern port of Gwadar on Sunday as it was escorting a delegation of Chinese nationals to a construction project, the military and China's consulate in Karachi said.
articles.title: Militants attack Pakistani military convoy escorting Chinese nationals

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: A U.S.-led naval coalition in the Gulf has warned ships in the region to stay away from Iranian waters to avoid possible seizure, the U.S. Navy said.
articles.title: U.S.-led naval group warns ships to avoid Iranian waters to avoid seizure

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The political party of Ecuador's assassinated presidential hopeful, Fernando Villavicencio, on Sunday picked another replacement candidate, reversing itself from its choice just a day earlier.
articles.title: Party of assassinated candidate in Ecuador taps a new replacement

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Colombian prosecutors announced sexual abuse charges on Saturday against the father of two of the four Indigenous children who survived a May plane crash in the South American country's Amazon region.
articles.title: Father of Colombian children who survived plane crash accused of abuse

articles.author: Felix Onuah, Sali Samb
articles.description: Coup leaders in Niger are open to diplomacy to resolve a standoff with West Africa's regional bloc, a group of senior Nigerian Islamic scholars said on Sunday after meeting the junta in Niamey.
articles.title: Nigerian delegation says Niger junta is open to diplomacy

articles.author: Tim Reid
articles.description: As Florida Governor Ron DeSantis flipped pork chops in front of the cameras at the Iowa State Fair on Saturday, a plane appeared in the broiling blue sky.
articles.title: Trump heading for Republican 'coronation' as 2024 rivals struggle to stop him

articles.author: Guy Faulconbridge
articles.description: A Russian warship fired warning shots with automatic weapons on Sunday on a Palau-flagged dry cargo ship in the southwestern Black Sea as it made its way towards Ukraine, the Russian defence ministry said.
articles.title: Russian warship fires warning shots on cargo ship in Black Sea

articles.author: Nicolás Misculin
articles.description: Argentines head to the polls on Sunday in primary elections, with voters set to punish the ruling center-left Peronist coalition, angry at inflation scraping 116% and a cost of living crisis that has left four in 10 people in poverty.
articles.title: Argentina set for primary vote with ruling Peronists fighting for survival
